arStrings.szText: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Hitting a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy has up to a {c_number}{SF_4}%{/c} chance to increase your damage by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} for {c_number}[SF_2]{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|%x|]{/c}. At {c_number}[SF_1]{/c} stacks, this bonus resets and you Execute all Nearby Non-Elite enemies.
You are dealing {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage per stack.
